bug.author: ahtsan
bug.description: This is not possible at the moment, because policies do not build itself. Parameters do not exist before a network is built. Once issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rlworkgroup/garage/issues/1445>#1445</denchmark-link> is resolved, we should fix so that it also copies parameters.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ahtsan>@ahtsan</denchmark-link> is this done? does it need backports?
